title: 17 Seito
description:
V.1 - 17 Seito
Arioka Yukihiro. 17 years old. A third-year high schooler. He is capable of handling things well and has good looks. That’s why he takes things for granted, knowing that it will end satisfactorily for him. Until…

Mishima Makoto. 26 years old. A teacher. He lives his life diligently, sincerely, and while holding on to unspoken feelings.

V.2 - 17 Kyoushi
